p: Wistar rats (female, 250–280 g) were purchased from Changchun Yisi Experimental Animal Co., Ltd., and raised in a controlled environment (22–24°C; 55–60% humidity and 12/12-h light/dark cycle) with free access to food and water. Animals were treated according to the Guide for the Care and Use of Laboratory Animals (US National Institutes of Health) ( 17) and the Committee for the Care and Use of Laboratory Animals of Jilin University (Changchun, China). The animal experiments of the present study were approved by the Ethical Committee for Experimental Animals, School of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Jilin University (approval no. 20190049).
